thread.section_title: Legend Hotel by Elegancia - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: THE BEST!!!
thread.title_full: THE BEST!!! - Review of Legend Hotel by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: D1608QAmatthewk
title: THE BEST!!!
text:
Everything was wonderful: the location, the service, the room, the bed, the lighting, the free WiFi, free coffee (crucial), the concierge service, and the overall aesthetic. We stayed in three other hotels, and this one had the best service out of the three.
Room Tip: We enjoyed all of the amenities, and we are sure you will too. See more room tips
